Dear friends, we are going further with our story about Neural Networks and the second part of it will explain

What is a neural network

A neural network is a simple computational model, which consists of a vector of inputs, several computational units and outputs (Fig.1). Originally, such model design was inspired by small parts of the human brain, neurons.
